text: We can only enforce one table since the page paths have to be unique. If we allowed two tables then we wouldn't know which row to route to. If you create one dynamic template and two pages under slugs `table1/` `table2/` you could make it work

My Repeater Custom Module groups seem to be using a global version of a variable instead of the local grouping version when applying conditional logic - anyone else run into problems with display logic when using repeaters?
ex: Show <X Group> when <Var> is 1, Show <Y Group> when Var is 2, etc
They all seem to be applying the Show <X Group> no matter what <Var> is in each of the repeated elements (i.e. pulling the first repeated <Var> value for all subsequent repeated groups)
do you have some info or case study on how to do that or something that i can read?
